text: He wrote a play: they said he believed Shakespeare; he wrote a novel: they said he believed Proust; he wrote a tale: they said he believed Chejov; he wrote a letter: they said he believed Lord Chesterfield; he wrote a diary: they said he believed Pavese; he wrote a farewell: they said he believed Cervantes; he stopped writing: they said he believed Rimbaud; he wrote an epitaph: they said he thought he was dead. The letter e, 1987
title: Epitafio encontrado en el cementerio Monte Parnaso de San Blas, S.B.
author: Augusto Monterroso
